description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named RootController. It provides two publicly accessible endpoints: '/' returning a simple server status message, and '/ready' serving as a lightweight readiness probe for the application.

classes.name: RootController
classes.description: A REST controller that provides basic health check endpoints for server status and readiness.

methods.name: root
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/' and returns a simple message indicating the backend is running.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/ready' and returns an HTTP 200 OK indicating the server is ready.
